action.action-desc: Mr. Tony Gonzales of Texas introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To include sexual assault and aggravated sexual violence in the definition of aggravated felonies under the Immigration and Nationality Act in order to expedite the removal of aliens convicted of such crimes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Better Enforcement of Grievous Offenses by unNaturalized Emigrants or the BE GONE Act.

section.header: Expanding the definition of aggravated felonies under the Immigration and Nationality Act
